description.desc1: subnodes create child-workspaces and help to get more structure into a project.
description.desc2: Use sub-inlets and sub-outlets to connect your different project parts with patching cords

Name.descript: give the node a meaningfull name that represents its containing functionality

Notes.note1: the main switch's state will not be stored in the project. It is merely there for easy switching on and off nodes that are contained by the subnode.

Feedback.feedback1: Documentations take a lot of time and effort. Unfortunately both are scarce ressources.
Feedback.feedback2: If you would like to have more info about this node please drop a note. It helps to set priorities according to the user needs...
